newsitem.title: CANADA: Petro-Canada picks group to build oil rig.
newsitem.headline: Petro-Canada picks group to build oil rig.

text.p: Petro-Canada said on Thursday that it has awarded a contract to the Grand Bank Alliance to design and build a steel monohull floating rig for the Alberta company's offshore Terra Nova oil project.
Pre-production costs for the facility, subsea system and pre-production wells are expected to be about C$1.6 billion, Petro-Canada said.
The Alliance bid offers the best technical solution, the lowest overall costs and shortest construction schedule, said Norm McIntyre, Petro-Canada's executive vice-president.
